extensionDescription.message: Adds new features to favorite players: track info notifications, controls outside of browser window, and list of recently played.

notificationFavoriteStatusSuccess.message: ¡Gracias por reconocer el duro trabajo de un DJ!

notificationButtonsVolumeUpTitle.description: Out of 3 possible variants (volume, sound volume, sound volume level), please use 'sound volume'.

notificationButtonsVolumeDownTitle.description: Out of 3 possible variants (volume, sound volume, sound volume level), please use 'sound volume'.

notificationButtonsVolumeChangeFeedback.description: Sound volume level after a change. Out of 3 possible variants (volume, sound volume, sound volume level), please use 'sound volume'.

kbps.description: Kilobit per second. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Data_rate_units#Kilobit_per_second for more information.

showPlayerEventNotification.description: Show notification on playback start/stop, on sound volume change, on added to playlist event, on track favorited event, on track switch, and so on.

showPlayerEventNotificationLong.message:
Show notification on playback start/stop/resume, on sound volume change, on added to playlist event, on track favorited event, on track switch, and so on.

If unchecked, you can still make the notification show up by calling “Show notification” command with the help of keyboard shortcuts (Alt+Shift+Q if unchanged).

showSuccessfulUpdateNotification.message: Show when PoziTone is successfully updated

displayKeyboardShortcutsTips.message: Display keyboard shortcuts tips next to commands

optionsSettingsSoundVolumeControl.description: Out of 3 possible variants (volume, sound volume, sound volume level), please use 'sound volume'.

optionsSettingsSoundVolumeControlUseDefa.description: Words inside <a /> tag should be the ones from 'module_general' and 'optionsNavSettings' ('General' and 'Settings' => 'general settings').

optionsSettingsSoundVolumeControlDelta.description: Used for a field asking to enter an integer value of percentage (1-99) which will be used when increasing or decreasing sound volume.

optionsSettingsGeneralUeip.message: Programa de Mejora de la Experiencia de Usuario de PoziTone

optionsSettingsGeneralUeipDesc.message: El Programa de Mejora de la Experiencia de Usuario recopila información sobre como nuestros usuarios usan PoziTone y los problemas que encuentran. Nuestro equipo de desarrolladores — PoziWorld — utiliza esta información para mejorar el producto, las funciones más usadas por los usuarios y ayuda en la resolución de problemas. La participación en este programa es voluntaria y el objetivo final es realizar mejoras en el programa para satisfacer a nuestros usuarios.

optionsSettingsGeneralUeipMore.message: Indícanos que cosas cambiar para mejorar el programa

optionsSettingsDisplayWhenMuted.message: Si el volumen esta a 0 % o sonido apagado

optionsSettingsDisplayWhenNoTrackInfo.message: Si no hay información sobre lo que actualmente se está reproduciendo (aparece como "..." en el sitio web)

optionsSettingsNotificationIconFormat.message: Formato de icono de la notificación

optionsSettingsAdditionalInfoShowCbr.description: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Constant_bitrate — if Wikipedia has an article in this language, please include a link. Otherwise remove <a /> from the translation.

optionsSettingsNotificationTitleFormatSh.message: Mostrar solo el nombre de esta estación

optionsSettingsNotificationTitleFormatLo.message: Mostrar nombre de esta estación + breve descripción (si existe)

optionsSettingsNotificationTitleFormatNo.message: Don't display information about current station or player

optionsSettingsNotificationButtons.message: Botones disponibles <small>(un máximo de 2 se puede mostrar a la vez)</small>

optionsSettingsNotificationButtonsAddAut.message: Add to playlist <small>(authorization required on site)</small>

voiceControlMenuItem.description: In some languages (for example, Russian), the name could be too long to fit on one line without wrapping when showing a “NEW” tag/label next to it.

voiceControlIntro1.message: PoziTone has added a new way for you to control your favorite online media players.

voiceControlIntro2.message: Now, besides keyboard shortcuts and buttons in the notification, you can use your voice to stop/resume playback, switch tracks, mute/unmute, add to playlist, etc.

voiceControlAllowInfo.message: After the permission is received, PoziTone will automatically restart itself for the changes to take effect.

voiceControlConnect.message: Follow VCA instructions to connect VCA with your browser

voiceControlAutoActivate.message: Automatically activate voice control app on PoziTone start or reload

voiceControlAutoReactivate.message: (Not recommended!) Automatically reactivate voice control app on app exit or shutdown

projectsDescriptionParagraph1.message: PoziTone is being developed by a small team called PoziWorld.

projectsDescriptionParagraph2.message: PoziWorld develops software that helps you solve everyday tasks easier, faster, more efficiently, is free to use, and does not track your activity without your prior agreement.

swaggyDescriptionParagraph2.message: Swaggy makes Swagbucks.com a little bit more accessible by letting you search, navigate, click, sort* without looking for the corresponding buttons, links, toggles on a page.

peDescriptionParagraph1.message: Lets you use your voice to control things you usually use your mouse and/or keyboard for.

peDescriptionParagraph2.message: Not a standalone app, works by sending commands to partner extensions installed in your browser.

sttbDescriptionParagraph1.message: Adds a scroll to top and/or bottom button.

sttbDescriptionParagraph2.message: Great for viewing long/infinite pages such as Facebook, Twitter, etc.

pwmDescriptionParagraph1.message: Helps you minimize print waste, save ink.

pwmDescriptionParagraph2.message: Go Green on the following Print Return Label pages: Amazon (amazon.com), American Eagle (ae.com), eBay, Newgistics SmartLabel, Nordstrom, Old Navy, Return Saver, and UPS (ups.com).

spreadTheWordWhyNot.message: If you find PoziTone useful, why not recommend it to your friends, colleagues, and/or followers?

spreadTheWordWays.message: There are a few ways you can help our cause:

spreadTheWordFollowUs.message: Follow us on Telegram, Facebook, Twitter, VK, Odnoklassniki, and Instagram.

spreadTheWordInstallationLink.message: Share the installation link on your social networks and/or blog.

spreadTheWordRateLink.message: Rate PoziTone – the feedback really helps others find this extension!

rateExtension.message: Please rate PoziTone – the feedback really helps others find this extension!

feedbackIdeas.message: Please share your ideas.

feedbackQuestions.message: Don't be shy to ask questions.

feedbackIssues.message: Bug reports are valuable!

feedbackPraises.message: We like praises, who doesn't? :)

feedbackIncentives.message: Stick is helpful, but carrot is sweeter. ;)

translationParagraph1.message: Sprechen Sie Deutsch? Vous parlez français?

translationParagraph2.message: We want as many PoziTone users as possible to be able to interact with the extension in their native language.

translationParagraph3.message: If you know any foreign language or just noticed a discrepancy in the translation, please let us know.

incentiveParagraph.message: If you appreciate the work we have done, please consider stimulating PoziTone development via PayPal, Square Cash, or Coinbase.

optionsContact.message: Contactar con los desarrolladores de PoziTone

versionHistoryHref.description: Please check whether there is a version of https://github.com/PoziWorld/PoziTone/blob/develop/HISTORY_en.md for your language.

optionsFoundation.message: PoziTone is made possible by love and kindness.

optionsHelpText.message: Al enviar a los desarrolladores de PoziTone la información especificada aquí abajo, estos intentarán solucionar de forma rápida el problema que estás experimentando.

popupNavRecentTracksPlaceholder.message:
Looking for some tunes?

How about some punk-rock with elements of hardcore?
Or hip-hop?
Fond of house?
Dream pop, indie pop, indie rock, neo soul, art rock, you said?

modulesBuiltInDescription.message: Add new features to your favorite online media players by enabling appropriate PoziTone modules.

modulesExternalDescription.message: An external PoziTone module is a standalone extension which is able to provide PoziTone features by communicating directly with PoziTone.

moduleHosts.message:
List of hosts/domains this module needs permission for in order to work properly.

PoziTone, including its built-in modules, does not read, change, store, or transmit any of your personal data (e.g., logins, passwords, messages, contacts) from any of the sites or your computer in absolutely any form.

trademarksDisclaimer.message: All trademarks mentioned belong to their owners. Third-party brands, product names, trade names, corporate names and company names may be trademarks of their respective owners or registered trademarks of other companies, and have been used for the purposes of explanation to the owner's benefit, without implying a violation of copyright law.

trademarksDisclaimerContinued.message: All information and content (texts, graphics and images) are reported to the best of our knowledge, public knowledge, if unintentionally, has been published or copyrighted material in violation of the law, please inform us and we will immediately remove it.

generalPrivacyStatement.message: PoziTone does not read, change, store, or transmit any of your personal data (e.g., logins, passwords, messages, contacts) from any of the sites or your computer in absolutely any form.

privacyStatementForClipboardWrite.message: “Modify data you copy and paste”: this permission is required to copy the requested information to your clipboard. PoziTone does not and will not read the contents of your clipboard, it only asks to write to it (a safe operation).

privacyStatementForOrigins.message: “Read and change your data”: this permission is required for the correct operation of PoziTone with a player (controlling playback, adjusting sound volume, getting current track name and performer).

privacyStatementForTabs.message: “Read your browsing history”: this permission is required for getting a current URL of the page on the basis of which PoziTone checks whether to load a corresponding module.

apiErrorTypeofMismatch.description: When the following JavaScript snippet equals true: typeof strCall !== 'string'

apiErrorMethodNotSupported.description: When method is valid but not supported by this call or not valid (for example, there is a typo)

apiErrorMissingRequiredParameter.description: Missing a parameter required for correct operation

apiConnectModuleHadBeenConnected.message: Module had already been connected to PoziTone

uiLanguage.description: Setting on the Options page: language of the user interface.

uiLanguageNote.message: On language change, PoziTone will automatically restart itself for the changes to take effect.
uiLanguageNote.description: A note that is displayed to user in regards to changing the UI language. In this case, it warns user that the extension will be restarted to apply the change.

language_browserDefault.description:
Language option.

If the extension supports the language that is chosen as default in the browser, use that one. Otherwise, use English (United States).

language_browserDefault_tooltip.message: If the extension supports the language that is chosen as default in the browser, use that one. Otherwise, use English (United States).
language_browserDefault_tooltip.description: Explanation of the “Automatic (browser default)” language option that should be shown in a tooltip.

language_be.description:
Language option: be (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).

If it doesn't match the current language, then write: *name of this language in the current language* - *native name of this language*.
If it does match the current language, then write: *native name of this language*.

Examples:
If the current language isn't English (United States) but Russian, this should say: Английский (Соединённые Штаты) - English (United States).
If the current language is English (United States), this should match it: English (United States).

If the current language is English (United States), this should match it: English (United States).
